headline: A Fresh Look at Alpine Income Property Trust’s (PINE) Valuation Following Major Richmond Retail Acquisition
summary: Alpine Income Property Trust (NYSE:PINE) just completed a $20.7 million purchase of fully leased retail space in Richmond, Virginia. The property is anchored by Walmart and introduces TJ Maxx to its lineup. This move immediately strengthens the REIT’s exposure to investment-grade tenants. See our latest analysis for Alpine Income Property Trust. Momentum has been building for Alpine Income Property Trust, with the stock’s 1-month share price return of 21.2% standing out after a string of...
